Package mph.gui.student

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ProjectInfoScreen
    This GUI class contains a tab with the information about the project a tab showing the teams enrolled in the project a tab which lets the student manage his/her project team if he/she has joined one a tab with the information about the requested project deliverables

    It extends JFrame.
    ProjectSelectionScreen
    This GUI class lets the student select a project from a tree.
    The tree is composed by: Professor nodes Course nodes contained in Professor nodes Project nodes contained in Course nodes

    It extends JFrame.
    See JTree.
    RegistrationScreen
    This GUI class lets a student register an account into the MPH system.
    It extends JFrame.
    StudentInfoScreen
    This GUI class lets a student see information about the other students registered into the MPH system.
    It extends JFrame.
    StudentMainScreen
    This GUI class lets the student update his/her personal information and contains the list of the enrolled projects.
    It also lets a student view the available projects and see information about other students.
    It extends JFrame.
